info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Flathead County through 215 PM MDT... At 128 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia Falls, or 13 miles north of Evergreen, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia Falls, West Glacier, Apgar, Hungry Horse, Martin City and Coram. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 132 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
